ai-mil3.6.2:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, may the Buddha please all see everything.”
ai-mil3.6.2:1.3_0: “Yes, great king, we are all-knowing and all-seeing.”
ai-mil3.6.2:1.4_0: “So, sir, for what reason do you lay down training rules for his disciples?”
ai-mil3.6.2:1.5_0: “But great king, is there any one of you who know this earth would be able to know the earth in all ways?”
ai-mil3.6.2:1.7_0: “Great king, what’s the time for sick postping the sick and the time for tonics? Or is it untimely unwrapped?”
ai-mil3.6.2:1.8_0: “When you’re sick, Sir, but you’re mixing with medicines at the right time, not at the wrong time.”
ai-mil3.6.2:1.9_0: “In the same way, great king, the Buddha doesn’t lay down training rules for his disciples until the time of his disciples are in order to preserve his disciples.”
ai-mil3.6.2:3.1_0: The second perception of the Absorption
